SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it
SHALL contain [1..1] Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.31)

SHOULD contain [1..*] component such that it
SHALL contain [1..1] CDA Specimen

SHOULD satisfy: The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.16 ResultTypeCode STATIC.
SHOULD satisfy: Contains one or more Specimen if the specimen isn't inherent in code value.
SHALL satisfy: The specimen element SHALL NOT conflict with the specimen inherent in code
SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more component

MAY satisfy: The target of one or more result organizer component relationships MAY be a procedure, to indicate the means or technique by which a result is obtained, particularly if the means or technique isn't inherent in code or if there is a need to further specialize the code value.
MAY satisfy: A result organizer component / procedure MAY be a reference to a procedure described in the Procedure section.
SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more sources of information.
